articles.title: With an Intel recovery underway, all eyes turn to its foundry business
articles.summary: Intel added $20 billion to its balance sheet in Q3 but didn't offer many details on the progress of its floundering foundry business.
articles.content: Intel added $20 billion to its balance sheet in Q3 but didn't offer many details on the progress of its floundering foundry business.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac
articles.summary: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications, Inc. , the startup behind Sky — an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view your screen and take actions in your apps.
articles.content: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications, Inc., the startup behind Sky — an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view your screen and take actions in your apps.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: 20-year-old dropouts built AI notetaker Turbo AI to 5 million users
articles.summary: Rudy Arora and Sarthak Dhawan, two 20-year-old college dropouts, grew an AI note-taker app to five million users and an eight-figure ARR, they say.
articles.content: Rudy Arora and Sarthak Dhawan, two 20-year-old college dropouts, grew an AI note-taker app to five million users and an eight-figure ARR, they say.

articles.title: Instagram users can now use Meta AI editing tools directly in IG Stories
articles.summary: Meta AI's photo editing tools can be found in Instagram Stories when tapping the paintbrush icon.  Users can describe what they want to add, remove, or change.
articles.content: Meta AI's photo editing tools can be found in Instagram Stories when tapping the paintbrush icon. Users can describe what they want to add, remove, or change.

articles.title: Microsoft’s Mico is a ‘Clippy’ for the AI era
articles.summary: Microsoft has unveiled “Mico,” a new animated avatar for its Copilot AI that brings back shades of Clippy.  The expressive blob acts as a friendly, customizable face for the chatbot.
articles.content: Microsoft has unveiled “Mico,” a new animated avatar for its Copilot AI that brings back shades of Clippy. The expressive blob acts as a friendly, customizable face for the chatbot.

articles.title: Tensormesh raises $4.5M to squeeze more inference out of AI server loads
articles.summary: Tensormesh uses an expanded form of KV caching to make inference loads as much as 10 times more efficient.

articles.title: Palantir enters $200M partnership with telco Lumen to offer enterprise AI services
articles.summary: Palantir said on Thursday it had struck a partnership with Lumen Technologies that will see the telecommunications company using the data management company's AI software to build capabilities to supp.
articles.content: Palantir said on Thursday it had struck a partnership with Lumen Technologies that will see the telecommunications company using the data management company's AI software to build capabilities to support enterprise AI services.

articles.title: Sora update to bring AI videos of your pets, new social features, and soon, an Android version
articles.summary: OpenAI’s hit AI video app, Sora, is getting a wave of new features, including video editing tools, pet and object “cameos,” and enhanced social options.  The Android app is also “coming soon.
articles.content: OpenAI’s hit AI video app, Sora, is getting a wave of new features, including video editing tools, pet and object “cameos,” and enhanced social options. The Android app is also “coming soon."
